functionality.name: Login & Registration
functionality.description: Features to allow users to register, log in, and recover accounts with data validation and verification notifications.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to create an account as an individual or a company by providing personal or business information.
The system must validate the data entered by the user, including email, CPF, and passwords.
The system must provide error messages when required fields are incomplete or incorrect.
The system must allow users to log in using their registered email and password.
The system must notify users when their data is being verified and when the verification process is complete.
The system must support password recovery for users who forgot their credentials.

epics.description: Enable users to register as an individual or company.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to choose between registering as an individual or a company to provide the relevant details.

tasks.description: Implement a dropdown menu for users to select registration type (individual or company).

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my personal or business details to create an account.

tasks.description: Create UI fields for capturing personal or business details (e.g., CPF, CNPJ, name, email).
Implement backend logic for saving user data securely in the database.

epics.description: Validate and handle errors during the registration process.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive feedback if my registration data is incomplete or incorrect.

tasks.description: Design validation rules for required fields and formats (e.g., CPF format, valid email).
Display error messages for invalid or incomplete input data.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to confirm my email and password to complete registration securely.

tasks.description: Add functionality for confirming email and password match during registration.

epics.description: Provide login functionality with error handling for incorrect credentials.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in to the system using my email and password.

tasks.description: Design a login form with fields for email and password.
Implement API endpoints for user authentication.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive an error message if my login credentials are incorrect.

tasks.description: Add error handling for incorrect login credentials.

epics.description: Notify users about data verification status.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be informed when my registration data is under verification.

tasks.description: Create a notification page or modal indicating that user data is under verification.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive a notification when my data has been verified.

tasks.description: Implement backend logic to send a notification when data verification is complete.
Design a UI element to display verification success.
